data.message: Is it possible to fix it so that when you are mobile and you click a shared pic, that is takes you to the original thread of the original post? It no longer does that and it's frustrating! It works if you are on a computer, but not when you're on mobile.

replies.message: Thanks for your feedback, Jenn. We're constantly working to improve the Facebook experience for everyone and if there's something specific we can do to improve yours, please let us know at: http://bit.ly/2fsZYOx. -Joe
